title: (x) "Nightcrawla" logo font - hand-drawn {Minimalista}
content:
Hi, I need some help finding out what font [this logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20100225214820/http:/nightcrawla.com/nightcrawla_old/images/backdrops/night_logo.gif) is. It's a graffiti style font, specifically a Philadelphia breed.

I'm working on a project on street art, and any help would be greatly appreciated.
author: prohighfiver

comments.content: None of the repeated characters match. I think it was hand drawn.
